dict.acceptation: 子夜，午夜；漆黑；一段黑暗阴暗的时间；漏夜；

sent.orig: The best integrated turf quality was recorded in Ram I、Midnight、America、Connie、Liberator, which could be adopted in Shanxi.
sent.trans: RamI、Midnight、America、Connie、Liberator综合质量表现均衡且分值较高，是山西省推广应用的重点品种。

sent.orig: He looked at his watch. It was nearly midnight, he as well open his gifts now.
sent.trans: 他看了一下表，快到午夜了，可以打开礼物盒了。

sent.orig: Midnight: 12 o'clock, the end of the day.
sent.trans: 午夜：（晚上）12点整，一天的结束。

sent.orig: Hostilities between the two sides ceased at midnight.
sent.trans: 双方在午夜停止敌对行动。

sent.orig: Princess Bnn: Bt midnight, I'll turn into a pumpkin and drive away in my glass slipper.
sent.trans: 安娜公主：在午夜，我会变出一个南瓜而且穿着我的透明水晶鞋乘车离开。
